channel.title: Website on Archphile
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Archphile

item.title: Welcome to the new Archphile website
item.description: Hi all, Archphile website was moved to a new, much simpler and easier to maintain platform, named hugo, using manis theme. The old tips and tricks section has been completely removed. Everything you need to know about Archphile, is covered by the manual . Regards, Mike
